title: Solo Leveling
description: A weak hunter becomes the strongest through a mysterious system that levels him up.
author: Chugong

title: The Legendary Moonlight Sculptor
description: A player sculpts his way through a virtual world to change his fate and that of his family.
author: Nam Heesung

title: Give Me the Legendary Item
description: A quirky adventure about a protagonist obsessed with obtaining a single legendary item at any cost.
author: Y. Boucher

title: Only Ending for the Villainess Is Death
description: After remembering her previous life, the villainess tries to avoid the single ending written for her: death.
author: S. Park

title: The Villainess Lives Twice
description: Reborn as the villainess, she uses knowledge of the future to change her fate and those around her.
author: M. Kim

title: Return of the 8th Class Magician
description: A once-great magician returns to the world stronger than ever to exact his plan.
author: K. Hwang

title: The Baby Tyrant
description: A lighthearted story about a child with an unexpectedly tyrannical personality and those who love him.
author: L. Tran

title: The Wicked Princess
description: A princess labeled wicked fights political intrigue while hiding a kinder heart than people believe.
author: H. Lee

title: Parallel Paradise
description: Transported to a strange world, the protagonist must adapt while uncovering dark secrets about the realm.
author: T. Nakamura

title: The Stellar Swordmaster
description: A tale of swords and stars: a young warrior rises to master an ancient stellar blade.
author: R. Choi

title: Blade of Midnight
description: An elite assassin navigates the city's criminal networks to dismantle a corporate syndicate that betrayed him.
author: J. Park

title: Iron Fist Academy
description: Rookies train in a brutal martial arts academy where only the strongest survive and the stakes are life or death.
author: K. Han

title: Rogue Protocol
description: A cyber-soldier with a corrupted implant goes rogue to expose a government AI controlling the city.
author: M. Seo

title: Warborn: Frontier
description: Squads fight brutal skirmishes on contested frontiers while veterans clash over tactics and survival.
author: S. Kim

title: Shadow Arsenal
description: A weapons broker assembles a team of mercenaries to pull off impossible heists against fortified targets.
author: D. Lee

title: Steel Coliseum
description: Combatants battle in a deadly arena where custom weapons and raw skill decide who climbs to the top.
author: H. Yoon

title: Last Bullet Protocol
description: In a shattered world, a lone operative races across hostile zones to stop a weaponized faction from rising.
author: A. Cho

title: Vanguard Rebellion
description: A disgraced commander leads an insurgent force to topple a corrupt regime on the brink of civil war.
author: L. Park

title: A Returner's Magic Should Be Special
original_title: A Returner's Magic Should Be Special
description: A magician returns to the past to prevent the world's destruction.
author: Sun-Wook Jeon

title: The Live
description: After surviving a catastrophe, a young man fights to save others.
author: N/A

title: Return to the Legendary Realm
description: A hero returns to a mythical world to change humanity's fate.
author: Lee Hae-Min

title: A Moi the Legendary Item
description: A hero finds a legendary item that changes his life and the world.
author: N/A

title: Only Ending for the Villainess is Death
original_title: Only Ending for the Villainess is Death
description: In a world of deadly trials, the villainess fights to survive against all odds.
author: N/A

title: The Boxer
description: A young prodigy rises through the ranks in a brutal boxing world.
author: JH

title: The Second Coming of Gluttony
description: A man who lost everything returns with a mysterious power to change his fate.
author: Ro Yujin

title: Ranker Who Lives A Second Time
original_title: Ranker Who Lives A Second Time
description: After discovering his brother's death, a man climbs a deadly tower to seek revenge.
author: Sadoyeon
